meanings.definition: A piece of paper or other material pasted onto the inside cover of a book.
meanings.sent1: The pastedown in the book had a beautiful floral design.
meanings.sent2: I found a note hidden under the pastedown of the old novel.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the pastedown was a secret entrance to another world.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a pastedown, hiding the true emotions beneath.
meanings.sent5: The pastedown was like a welcome mat to the story within the book.

meanings.definition: To affix (something) to a surface with paste.
meanings.sent1: She carefully pastedown the pictures in her scrapbook.
meanings.sent2: The students pastedown their artwork on the classroom walls.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to pastedown the recipe on the kitchen cabinet for easy access.
meanings.sent4: His words pastedown in her mind, leaving a lasting impression.
meanings.sent5: The artist's creativity pastedown on the canvas, creating a masterpiece.

meanings.definition: The act of pasting something down.
meanings.sent1: The pastedown of the poster was done with precision.
meanings.sent2: I could hear the pastedown of the wallpaper in the next room.
meanings.sent3: The pastedown of the flyers around town brought a pop of color to the streets.
meanings.sent4: The pastedown of memories in her scrapbook was a labor of love.
meanings.sent5: The pastedown of the labels on the jars made the pantry look organized.
